name: Update Documentation on Merge
description: Automatically update relevant documentation when code is merged to main branch
prompt:
Code was just merged to the main branch. Review the changed files and update documentation accordingly:

1. Analyze the git diff to understand what changed:
   - New features added
   - API changes or new endpoints
   - Configuration changes
   - Breaking changes

2. Update the following documentation files as needed:
   - README.md: Add new features to feature list, update setup instructions if needed
   - .kiro/specs/project-overview.md: Update if major features were added or architecture changed
   - API documentation: Document any new API routes or changes to existing ones
   - Component documentation: Add JSDoc comments to new components

3. If this merge includes breaking changes:
   - Add a BREAKING CHANGE notice to the relevant docs
   - Update migration guides if they exist

4. Check if any code examples in docs need updating due to API changes

5. Update the 'Last Updated' date in modified documentation files

Focus on user-facing documentation. Keep updates concise and actionable. If no documentation updates are needed, explain why.
